Method Detail

onOtherExceptionFallback

protected boolean onOtherExceptionFallback(android.app.Activity activity,
                                           java.lang.Object component,
                                           java.lang.Throwable throwable)
Description copied from class: ActivityController.AbstractExceptionHandler
This method will be invoked by the #onOtherException() method, as a fallback if the provided throwable has not been handled neither by the #handleCommonCauses() nor the #handleOtherCauses() methods.

A dialog box which reports the problem will be popped up.

Overrides:
onOtherExceptionFallback in class ActivityController.AbstractExceptionHandler
Parameters:
activity - the activity from which the throwable has been thrown ; cannot be null
component - the component responsible for having thrown the exception
throwable - the throwable that has been triggered
Returns:
true if and only if the throwable has been handled
